whoAreWe.title: Who are we?

whoAreWe.card2Text: You can contact our team through the contact page

AboutPage.title: Our Service
AboutPage.section1Text: By introducing universities in general in terms of specializations, preference, location and a lot of information related to them
AboutPage.section2Text: By clarifying the advantages of each university from the other so that the student chooses his favorite university
